title: 西蒙·拉特指挥《波吉和贝丝》
short_description: 拥有如普契尼歌剧般的凄美爱情故事和优美的唱段，时不时还会融入摇摆的”街头元素“：乔治·格什温的《波吉和贝丝》在体现音乐戏剧性深度的同时，也兼备了消遣和娱乐的功能。2012年9月，西蒙·拉特爵士为我们演绎了这部作品，当晚顶级的明星演出阵容由维拉德·怀特和拉托尼雅·摩尔领衔。

metadata.title: 西蒙·拉特指挥《波吉和贝丝》

interview.title: 西蒙·拉特爵士与维拉德·怀特爵士对话莎拉·维利斯
interview.description: Almost every music lover can whistle at least one or two tunes from Gershwin’s [Porgy and Bess]. Yet very few are aware of just how much outstanding music there is in the rest of the opera alongside hits such as “Summertime” or “I got plenty o’ nuttin’”. Only a complete performance of the score can reveal the work’s emotional depth and precise characterization. And it was such a performance that the Berliner Philharmoniker and chief conductor Sir Simon Rattle gave in September 2012 in the Philharmonie. Sir Simon Rattle and Sir Willard White, this performance’s Porgy, discuss the opera with Sarah Wills, horn player with the Berliner Philharmoniker.
interview.short_description: 2012年9月，维拉德·怀特爵士在乔治·格什温的音乐会版 《波吉与贝丝》中饰演了男主角波吉一角。在演出间隙，他与指挥西蒙·拉特爵士和柏林爱乐圆号演奏员莎拉·维利斯进行了一次对话。

metadata.title: 西蒙·拉特爵士与维拉德·怀特爵士对话莎拉·维利斯
metadata.description: 2012年9月，维拉德·怀特爵士在乔治·格什温的音乐会版 《波吉与贝丝》中饰演了男主角波吉一角。在演出间隙，他与指挥西蒙·拉特爵士和柏林爱乐圆号演奏员莎拉·维利斯进行了一次对话。

concert.title: 西蒙·拉特指挥《波吉和贝丝》

interview.title: 后台探秘：《波吉与贝丝》
interview.description: Everyone knows melodies from George Gershwin’s Porgy and Bess such as “Summertime” and “I Loves You, Porgy”. On the other hand, the complete work, which the composer absolutely wanted to be called an opera and not a musical, is rarely heard. Despite having participated in countless performances of the work, the wonderful Cape Town Opera Voice of the Nation Chorus, which was engaged for the concert of the Berliner Philharmoniker in September 2012, had never sung the unabridged version – until this performance with Sir Simon Rattle and the Berliner Philharmoniker. In this documentary, Philharmoniker horn player Sarah Willis attends a chorus rehearsal and talks to the vocal soloists of the performance, including the soprano Latonia Moore, who took over the title role of Bess for an indisposed colleague at short notice.
interview.short_description: 2012年秋季，西蒙·拉特爵士与柏林爱乐乐团及多位艺术家联手，为观众呈现了乔治·格什温的音乐会版 《波吉与贝丝》。在这里，您可以看到乐团圆号演奏员莎拉·维利斯与参演人员之间的谈话。

metadata.title: 后台探秘：《波吉与贝丝》
